entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM PST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 2.
